ICON_SIZE.NAME: Icon Size
ICON_SIZE.HINT: Change the pixel size of the icons. Default: 50.

FONT_SIZE.NAME: Font Size
FONT_SIZE.HINT: Change the font size of the text in the effects. Default: 16.

HIDE_DISABLED.NAME: Hide Disabled Effects
HIDE_DISABLED.HINT: If enabled, any disabled effects will not show up.

HIDE_PASSIVE.NAME: Hide Passive Effects
HIDE_PASSIVE.HINT: If enabled, any passive effects will not show up.

DAYS_PER_WEEK.NAME: Days per Week
DAYS_PER_WEEK.HINT: The number of days in a week.

WEEKS_PER_MONTH.NAME: Weeks per Month
WEEKS_PER_MONTH.HINT: The number of weeks in a month.

MONTHS_PER_YEAR.NAME: Months per Year
MONTHS_PER_YEAR.HINT: The number of months in a year.
